prompt: Greet the user and ask how you can help.
expected_output: Hello! How can I help you today?

prompt: A user asks how to reset their password. Provide steps briefly.
expected_output: Go to Settings > Security > Reset Password. Check your email for the verification code.

prompt: Explain our refund policy in one or two lines.
expected_output: We offer refunds within 30 days for defective items. Contact support with your order ID.
